name: GPT-4o (Nov 2024)
description: GPT-4o November 2024 release with increased output capacity (16,384 tokens), enhanced multimodal capabilities, and improved performance in non-English languages and vision tasks.
notes: November 20, 2024 update significantly expanded output capacity from 4,096 to 16,384 tokens while maintaining the same pricing structure. Faster and cheaper than GPT-4 Turbo with stronger vision capabilities.
